pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evolutionary Diversity Metrics for Raster Data // Phylogenetic Diversity (PD, Faith 1992), Evolutionary Distinctiveness (ED, Isaac et al. 2007), Phylogenetic Endemism (PE, Rosauer et al. 2009; Laffan et al. 2016), and Weighted Endemism (WE, Laffan et al. 2016) for presence-absence raster. Faith, D. P. (1992) doi:10.1016/0006-3207(92)91201-3 Isaac, N. J. et al. (2007) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0000296 Laffan, S. W. et al. (2016) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12513 Rosauer, D. et al. (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1365-294X.2009.04311.x.
